subcommands.name: record
subcommands.description: Records stack trace information to a flamegraph, speedscope or raw file

subcommands.name: top
subcommands.description: Displays a top like view of functions consuming CPU

subcommands.name: dump
subcommands.description: Dumps stack traces for a target program to stdout

subcommands.name: help
subcommands.description: Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)
